segments.text: I observe the scene in this kitchen illustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is facing the sink, drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron make her look like a typical homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is flooding; water pours over the rim continuously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's drenching the cabinet doors and pooling on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot submerged in the growing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy perches precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, its base unstable under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches toward the cookie jar in the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies are spilling out as he grabs a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl watches eagerly, her hand extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like this is the best moment ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden seems serene and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast to the hidden chaos and risks inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me worry about what might go wrong next.
segments.speaker: PAR
